name: linkedin-job-manager
description: LinkedIn Job Manager with React UI and Python Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd job-manager-ui && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "python fastapi_server.py" "cd job-manager-ui && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd job-manager-ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd job-manager-ui && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist

author: Your Name
